text: The full moon rose gloriously over the people, and all the dogs of that town began to bark at him. And the dog barked not, and said to the others with a loud voice, Wake not the silence of your sleep, and draw not the moon to the earth with its barking. Then all the dogs stopped barking, creating a terrible silence. But the dog who had spoken to them kept barking and asking for silence for the rest of the night. FIN
title: La luna llena
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
